title.rendered: “IDF Launches Strategic Strikes Against Hezbollah’s Military Infrastructure in Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanon; military buildings, sites, and positions used by the organization were hit.

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked military buildings, observation posts, and military sites of the terrorist organization over wide areas, Al-Dhahira, Aita al-Shaab and additional areas in southern Lebanon.

In addition, the IDF attacked an operational command center and terrorist infrastructure of Hezbollah earlier today (Monday). Also, a number of targets posing a threat in southern Lebanon were hit using artillery and tanks.

During the day, a number of firings from Lebanon were identified that fell into open areas in the Margaliot and Zarit regions.

Following the alarms activated in the Katzrin area, mortar shells were fired towards two suspected aerial targets, the event ended.

Attached is footage from IDF attacks: https://bit.ly/3UnGxwd
